about_the_game:
In this informative art book, with notes straight from the developer, take a look back in time and see how the the characters and world of Absolute Tactics changed in look and design over the years of development.

A huge thanks to all the talented artists who contributed to Absolute Tactics: Daughters of Mercy!

  • Jason Shields
  • Armando Sionosa
  • Luis Avila
  • Matias Tapia
  • Dmitry Piatyhorets
  • Scott Kester
  • Nguyen Uy Vu
  • Breno Girafa
  • Cael Nolan
  • Nakarin Sukontakorn
  • Gabi Overberg
  • Suhail Chada
  • Laura Espinosa

short_description: Absolute Tactics: Daughters of Mercy is a turn-based, tactical RPG featuring strategic battles, intriguing puzzles and exciting quests. Customize your heroes’ unique, class-based attacks and abilities to defeat Father Eldritch's oppressive armies throughout dozens of unique, hand-crafted maps!
